sentences.en: "Would you do me a favour?" she asked hesitantly.
sentences.cn: “你能帮我个忙吗？”她迟疑地问。

sentences.cn: 另一种可能性是亲鸟会偏爱强壮的雏鸟。

sentences.en: Both countries seem to favour the agreement.
sentences.cn: 两个国家似乎都更倾向于这份协议。

sentences.en: Could you do me a favour and pick up Sam from school today?
sentences.cn: 今天你能帮我个忙去学校接萨姆吗？

sentences.cn: 你帮个忙告诉凯莉说我来不了好吗？

sentences.en: Do yourself a favour and make sure you get some time to yourself.
sentences.cn: 对自己好些，一定要留点时间给自己。

sentences.en: Do yourself a favour, and cut that behaviour out.
sentences.cn: 为了你自己，别那样做了。

sentences.en: events were moving in his favour.
sentences.cn: 事情正按对他有利的方向发展。

sentences.en: He abdicated in favour of his son.
sentences.cn: 他把王位让给了儿子。

sentences.cn: 他雇约翰是给他父亲一个面子。

sentences.en: he stepped down as leader in favour of his rival.
sentences.cn: 他下台不再担任领导职务，由他的对手接任。

sentences.en: His arguments in favour of a new school are very persuasive.
sentences.cn: 他赞成办一座新学校的理由很有说服力.

sentences.en: Hot climate and plentiful rainfall favour the growth of plants.
sentences.cn: 炎热的气候和充足的雨水有助于植物生长.

sentences.en: I owed him a favour so I couldn’t say no.
sentences.cn: 我欠他一个人情，所以无法拒绝。

sentences.en: I'm sorry to call so late, but I need a favour.
sentences.cn: 这么晚打电话真是抱歉，可是我需要帮个忙。

sentences.cn: 我来这儿是想请你帮个忙。

sentences.cn: 我忙的时候她来帮忙，我能帮她的时候就还她人情。

sentences.cn: 十人投票赞成，五人反对，两人弃权。

sentences.cn: 该岛作为度假地极受欢迎。
